name: IntelÂ® Extension for TensorFlow* Getting Started
categories: Toolkit/oneAPI AI And Analytics/Features And Functionality
description: This code sample will guide users how to run a TensorFlow inference workload on both the GPU and CPU by using the AI Tools.

env: uv run --active ipython kernel install --user --env VIRTUAL_ENV $(pwd)/tensorflow --name=tensorflow-gs
uv run --active ipython kernel install --user --env VIRTUAL_ENV $(pwd)/tensorflow-gpu --name=tensorflow-gpu-gs
steps: uv run --active jupyter nbconvert --ExecutePreprocessor.enabled=True --ExecutePreprocessor.kernel_name=tensorflow-gs --to notebook ResNet50_Inference.ipynb
